html: When I heard @Bob_Schneider's version of "Making It Up" I immediately wanted to sing it, and he let me change a few things and make it mine. It's a great philosophy. You can hear his version of "Making It Up" on his 2018 release, Blood and Bones.
text: When I heard @Bob_Schneider's version of "Making It Up" I immediately wanted to sing it, and he let me change a few things and make it mine. It's a great philosophy. You can hear his version of "Making It Up" on his 2018 release, Blood and Bones.

html: "Making It Up" from my new album Know., available now – https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA  This is a @Bob_Schneider song. He's my songwriting hero and kind of a mentor to me. He's inspired and encouraged my songwriting for more than 15 years.pic.twitter.com/j7JatzaGFm
text:
"Making It Up" from my new album Know., available now – https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA 

This is a @Bob_Schneider song. He's my songwriting hero and kind of a mentor to me. He's inspired and encouraged my songwriting for more than 15 years.pic.twitter.com/j7JatzaGFm

html: Older live-versions were whoa - ahh - mumbles with something along the lines of, "once I dry these eyes I'll climb on to keep sleeping to dream about you." And I have no idea what that means. Thanks to Know., I now feel complete about the bridge. Toca's harmonies are great too.
text: Older live-versions were whoa - ahh - mumbles with something along the lines of, "once I dry these eyes I'll climb on to keep sleeping to dream about you." And I have no idea what that means. Thanks to Know., I now feel complete about the bridge. Toca's harmonies are great too.

html: "Sleeping To Dream" from my new album Know., available now – https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA  This 1999 fan-favorite has never appeared on a studio recording - until now. Once we made the decision to proceed with the song, I had to finally finish writing the bridge.pic.twitter.com/ZviLdjuvYa
text:
"Sleeping To Dream" from my new album Know., available now – https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA 

This 1999 fan-favorite has never appeared on a studio recording - until now. Once we made the decision to proceed with the song, I had to finally finish writing the bridge.pic.twitter.com/ZviLdjuvYa

html: While mixing we decided to mute the drums and keep it primarily acoustic. I love that it sounds like a slow song, but remains a lively 6/8 with a constant driving beat. @RainingJane appears in the epic cascading vocals. Listen now:https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA
text:
While mixing we decided to mute the drums and keep it primarily acoustic. I love that it sounds like a slow song, but remains a lively 6/8 with a constant driving beat. @RainingJane appears in the epic cascading vocals.

Listen now:https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA

html: "Let's See What The Night Can Do" from my new album Know., available now – https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA  Penned in February 2016 with the uber-talented Jon Green, this song instantly became my live-show opener. I knew since then it would kick start the album.pic.twitter.com/fxczOciP7B
text:
"Let's See What The Night Can Do" from my new album Know., available now – https://Atlantic.lnk.to/KnowTA 

Penned in February 2016 with the uber-talented Jon Green, this song instantly became my live-show opener. I knew since then it would kick start the album.pic.twitter.com/fxczOciP7B
